timeline.message:
Extract more code to helper class

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10143

support Postgrest process with CSV-Response (#10086)

* support Postgrest process with CSV-Response

* Happy flower uat product rest (#7175)

* minor Process-API improvements

* jsonpath can not be as big as it gets
* jsonpath is URL-encoded on the fly
* instead of giving an empty parameters list, you can simply POST without a request body

* fix for minor Process-API improvements

don't try to URL-encode the JSON-path instead, just remove line breaks

(cherry picked from commit ebabb7a5352eb9bdd36873f34c22aada3ff79742)

* postgrest process returns the correct content type (json or csv)

* add SQL for postgrest response type CSV

#9966

* make setting the string response clearer

#9966

(cherry picked from commit 120c8c6e7cd64bbb0d95815ca113779ae5a559b8)

timeline.bodyText:
ArchiveId shall not be used for C_Doc_OutBound_Log_ID.
(note that we have a dedicated AD_Archive table that is also referenced by C_Doc_Outbound_Log_Line)
timeline.author: metas-ts

replies.bodyText:
ArchiveId shall not be used for C_Doc_OutBound_Log_ID.

So should i add the ID class DocOutboundLogId or do you have something else in mind?
replies.author: TheBestPessimist

timeline.bodyText:
in theory you could check for C_Invoice.IsEdiEnabled..but that's an extra load..
or you could check for edi-export-status to be not null..but you already do that in the process anyways..
timeline.author: metas-ts

replies.bodyText: Checking for edi-export-status to be not null is not enough, because the C_Doc_Outbound_Log might also reference Sales Orders or Delivery Notes, and we don't want to change their statuses afaiu.
replies.author: TheBestPessimist

replies.bodyText:
or you could check for edi-export-status to be not null

...in addition to the check for C_Invoice which you do already
replies.author: metas-ts

timeline.message:
Update the checks if `C_Doc_Outbound_Log` is for C_Invoice

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/10143
Signed-off-by: TheBestPessimist <cristian@tbp.land>
